MS MCQs

    Protect your endpoint environment with Microsoft Endpoint Manager

    »

    1. How are the settings that you assign to devices and apps contained within Intune?

      Settings are contained as endpoints within Intune.

      Settings are contained in policies that you create.

      Settings are contained in Azure Storage.


    2. What platforms does Microsoft Endpoint Manager support?

      Microsoft Endpoint Manager supports a number of platforms, including iOS, iPadOS, macOS, Android, and Windows platforms.

      Microsoft Endpoint Manager supports a single, universal platform call Azure.

      Microsoft Endpoint Manager provides the tools you use to design your own endpoint protection platform.


    3. What are configuration policies versus protection policies?

      Configuration policies are used to set up devices and apps. Protection policies are used to prevent unauthorized access and prevent data leaks.

      Configuration policies are used to set up protection policies.

      Protection policies are used to deploy configuration policies.
